trans-unit.source: Combines the results of two or more queries into a single result set that includes all the rows that belong to all queries in the union.
trans-unit.target: Combines the results of two or more queries into a single result set that includes all the rows that belong to all queries in the union.

trans-unit.source: The UNION operation is different from using joins that combine columns from two tables.
trans-unit.target: The UNION operation is different from using joins that combine columns from two tables.

trans-unit.source: The following are basic rules for combining the result sets of two queries by using UNION:
trans-unit.target: The following are basic rules for combining the result sets of two queries by using UNION:

trans-unit.source: The number and the order of the columns must be the same in all queries.
trans-unit.target: The number and the order of the columns must be the same in all queries.

trans-unit.source: The data types must be compatible.
trans-unit.target: The data types must be compatible.

trans-unit.source: Is a query specification or query expression that returns data to be combined with the data from another query specification or query expression.
trans-unit.target: Is a query specification or query expression that returns data to be combined with the data from another query specification or query expression.

trans-unit.source: The definitions of the columns that are part of a UNION operation have to be the same or must be named same using an alias and must be compatible.
trans-unit.target: The definitions of the columns that are part of a UNION operation have to be the same or must be named same using an alias and must be compatible.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that multiple result sets are to be combined and returned as a single result set.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that multiple result sets are to be combined and returned as a single result set.

trans-unit.source: Incorporates all rows into the results.
trans-unit.target: Incorporates all rows into the results.

trans-unit.source: If not specified, duplicate rows are removed.
trans-unit.target: If not specified, duplicate rows are removed.
